Posts.Content: Scaredmommy1971723 wrote: Ohhhh the waiting! I'm not sure what they will be telling me today, but the rest of my pathology report came in since my first meeting with surgeon. ER+PR+ HER2-, also saw its not just IDC, but DCIS and sclerosing adenosis. I'm ready for a plan!!
